message: Let's split it evenly, Bob. Fair is fair.
I want a bit more, Alice.
I'm willing to give you a bit more, Bob, but I think this is still fair.  Let's end this before we lose more money.
Come on, Alice. I'm losing value here. Meet me in the middle... of my side.
I'm trying to be reasonable, Bob.  Let's settle this now before we both get nothing.
